Episode.Overview:
This is a series of webisodes, genereal watched as one 23 minute episode, but was originally released as an 8 part web series.
A young bike courier picks himself off the ground in a city alley. Unsure how he got there, he takes a closer look around and meets Sarah, a ghost, she clues him in to the world of the dead.
Sarah tutors Zach on ghost rules and warns him about the dark spirit he saw in the alleyway and sends Zach to attend his wake where he gets schooled by Sam, the spirit of a dead rapper whose wake is happening in the same funeral parlor.
Danny's presence at the wake infuriates Zach, who unleashes some ghostly energy on the living.
The spirit world is definitely getting stronger as Zach wreaks havoc on unsuspecting Danny.
Danny canâ€™t escape his living nightmare while Zach interrogates him in his dreams.
Zach and Danny face their demons and each other.
